about_the_game:
ANTONBALL DELUXE - FIXED GOLD EVIL BABY PAUL (SHINY) DLC

We've heard your feedback, Ball-Fans. Paul is great, but he could be even greater.

With that in mind, Summitsphere is proud to announce the most monumental DLC in video gaming history:

FIXED GOLD EVIL BABY PAUL (SHINY).

Fixed Gold Evil Baby Paul (Shiny) is many things. He is Gold, he is Evil, he is a Baby, he is Paul, and he is definitely Shiny. Most importantly, he is FINALLY fixed.

Just the way you remember him from your youth.

This brand new FIXED character is available now!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics or AMD Radeon HD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 80 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Creative Sound Blaster Audigy (or Equivalent)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i7
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics or AMD Radeon HD Graphics / Nvidia GeForce GTX 760 or Greater or AMD Radeon HD 7600 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 80 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Creative Sound Blaster Audigy (or equivalent)
